point","getParentAndBlockhash(bytes)":{"notice":"returns the blockhash and the parent blockhash from the provided blockheader"},"recreateBlockheaders(uint256,bytes[])":{"notice":"starts with a given blocknumber and its header and tries to recreate a (reverse) chain of blocksonly usable when the given blocknumber is already in the smart contractit will be checked whether the provided chain is correct by using the calculateBlockheaders functionif successfull the last blockhash of the header will be added to the smart contract"},"saveBlockNumber(uint256)":{"notice":"stores a certain signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier"},"return":"the amount of deposit to pay (2% + costs for the transaction)"},"cancelUnregisteringNode(address)":{"details":"reverts if the signer does not own a nodereverts if not the sender is not the owner of the nodereverts if the sender is currently challenged for inactivityreverts if the node is currently not unregistering","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of an in3-node"}},"confirmUnregisteringNode(address)":{"details":"reverts when not challenged and the sender is not the owner of the serverreverts when not challenged and the sender does not own a serverreverts when not challenged and the node is still activereverts when not challenged and the unregister-time is not yet overreverts when challenged and the sender is not the unregister callerreverts when challenged and the challange time is not yet over","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of an in3-node"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_blockRegistry":"address of a BlockhashRegistry-contract"}},"convict(uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"_blockNumber":"the blocknumber of the wrong blockhash","_hash":"keccak256(wrong blockhash, msg.sender, v, r, s), used to prevent frontrunning"}},"proveActivity(uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"reverts when not being challengedreverts when not called by owner or signerreverts when not enough proof of work is shown","params":{"_blockNumber":"blockNumber of the blockhash used to prove activity","_nonce":"nonce for the hash","_signer":"a in3-node signer address"}},"registerNode(string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"details":"will call the registerNodeInteral function","params":{"_props":"properties of the node","_timeout":"timespan of how long the node of a deposit will be locked. Will be at least for 1h","_url":"the url of the node, has to be unique","_weight":"how many requests per second the server is able to handle"}},"registerNodeFor(string,uint64,uint64,address,uint64)":{"details":"will call the registerNodeInteral function","params":{"_props":"properties of the node","_signer":"the signer of the in3-node","_timeout":"timespan of how long the node of a deposit will be locked. Will be at least for 1h","_url":"the url of the node, has to be unique","_weight":"how many requests per second the server is able to handle"}},"requestUnregisteringNode(address)":{"details":"reverts when the provided address is not an in3-signerreverts when the node is already unregisteringreverts when inactivity is claimedif not the server owner reverts when the send deposit it not correctreverts when being the owner and sending value through this function","params":{"_signer":"the signer of the in3-node"}},"returnDeposit(address)":{"details":"reverts when not the owner of the former in3-nodereverts when there is nothing to transferreverts if the deposit is still locked","params":{"_signer":"the signer-address of a former in3-node"}},"revealConvict(address,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"reverts if a block with that number cannot be found in either the latest 256 blocks or the blockhash registryreverts when tryin to convict someone with a correct blockhashreverts when trying to reveal immediately after calling convictreverts when the _signer did not sign the blockreverts when the wrong convict hash (see convict-function) is used","params":{"_blockNumber":"number of the wrongly provided blockhash","_blockhash":"the wrongly provided blockhash","_r":"r of the signature","_s":"s of the signature","_signer":"the address that signed the wrong blockhash","_v":"v of the signature"}},"totalNodes()":{"return":"the number of total in3-nodes"},"transferOwnership(address,address)":{"details":"reverts when trying to change ownership of an inactive nodereverts when trying to pass ownership to 0x0reverts when the sender is not the current ownerreverts when inacitivity is claimed","params":{"_newOwner":"the new owner","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier"}},"updateNode(address,string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"details":"reverts when the sender is not the owner of the nodereverts when the signer does not own a nodereverts when trying to increase the timeout above 10 yearsreverts when trying to change the url to an already existing one","params":{"_props":"the new properties, will be changed if different from the current onec","_signer":"the signer-address of the in3-node, used as an identifier","_timeout":"the new timeout of the node, cannot be decreased","_url":"the url, will be changed if different from the current one","_weight":"the amount of requests per second the server is able to handle"}}},"title":"Registry for IN3-nodes"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"calcUnregisterDeposit(address)":{"notice":"calculates the amount a sender has to pay in order to claim that a server is inactive"},"cancelUnregisteringNode(address)":{"notice":"this function must be called by the owner to cancel the unregister-process."},"confirmUnregisteringNode(address)":{"notice":"confirms the unregistering of a node by its owner or by the unregister-caller (challenger)if the node-owner calls the server will simply be removed from the nodelistthe the challenger successfully calls unregister then node-owner will lose 2% of his deposit which the challenger will get"},"constructor":"constructor","convict(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"commits a blocknumber and a hashmust be called before revealConvict"},"proveActivity(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"proving to the smart contract that the server is still activeby calculating a hash based on a keccak256(nonce,blockhash) that meets a certain difficulty"},"registerNode(string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"notice":"register a new node with the sender as owner"},"registerNodeFor(string,uint64,uint64,address,uint64)":{"notice":"register a new node as a owner using a different signer address"},"requestUnregisteringNode(address)":{"notice":"a node owner can request to unregister his nodebut before he can confirm, he has to wait for his own-set deposit timeoutcan also be called by a non owner, challenging the in3-node to prove that he is activein order to do so, a challenger has to stake an amount equal to 2% of the node's deposit"},"returnDeposit(address)":{"notice":"returns the deposit after a node has been removed due to inactivityonly callable after the timeout of the deposit is over"},"revealConvict(address,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"reveals the wrongly provided blockhash, so that the node-owner will lose its deposit"},"totalNodes()":{"notice":"length of the nodelist"},"transferOwnership(address,address)":{"notice":"changes the ownership of an in3-node"},"updateNode(address,string,uint64,uint64,uint64)":{"notice":"updates a node by adding the msg.value to the deposit and setting the props or
